vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in Reentrancy_cross_function.withdrawBalance (patch_9.sol#13-21):
	External calls:
	- (success) = msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)() (patch_9.sol#18)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- locked (patch_9.sol#20)
